title: Social Media Manager with SEO Background (Real Estate)
job_overview:
We're in search of a creative and detail-oriented Social Media Manager with administrative support skills and prior experience in real estate. This role involves growing our digital presence, producing impactful content, managing communication channels, and supporting marketing efforts. Candidates with a background in SEO and blog content creation are strongly encouraged to apply. Familiarity with tools like Ahrefs will be a plus.

TO APPLY KINDLY ATTACH YOUR RESUME AND PORTFOLIO LINK

Your Main Responsibilities:
-Plan and execute social media campaigns customized for the real estate audience.
-Develop and post visually engaging content across platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, and TikTok.
-Create visually appealing designs using tools like Canva to complement branding and messaging.
-Track social media performance and recommend improvements based on analytics.
-Contribute to online engagement efforts by managing community interactions and direct messages.
-Draft and publish SEO-friendly blog content to enhance search visibility (preferred).
-Conduct keyword research and basic SEO optimization using platforms like Ahrefs or similar tools.
-Provide administrative support including calendar scheduling, file management, and coordination tasks.

TO APPLY KINDLY ATTACH YOUR RESUME AND PORTFOLIO LINK

What We’re Looking For:
-1–2 years of experience in social media and/or admin roles, ideally in the real estate sector.
-Familiarity with social platforms and digital marketing trends.
-Ability to design high-quality graphics using Canva (experience with Adobe Suite is a bonus).
-Comfortable handling content planning, community interaction, and client messaging.
-Basic knowledge of CRMs like Follow Up Boss, Go High Level, or similar tools.
-Strong writing skills with experience in blog content and understanding of on-page SEO.
-Knowledge of SEO tools like Ahrefs is highly desirable.
-Able to multitask, stay organized, and adapt quickly to new processes.
-Must be able to work during US business hours (PST).
-Reliable device and strong internet connection are required.
-Must be ready to start immediately.
-Only candidates with real estate industry experience will be considered.
